title: KIM SWITCH / DISCUSSING KLAASJE DOWNSTAIRS
description: this should blink ONLY DOWNSTAIRS and after Klaasje rape hub exit

dialogueTree.title: You: ""You think this will make them coop..."
dialogueTree.text: "You think this will make them cooperate?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing will make them respect the..."
links.text: "Nothing will make them respect the RCM. But it will disrupt the game they prepared for us. We just stripped off one layer of whatever it is. Her decision to not corroborate their story was *definitely* not part of the plan."

links.title: You: "(Say in a hushed voice.) "Why *did*..."
links.text: (Say in a hushed voice.) "Why *did* she tell us all of that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What else could she have done? Lie..."
links.text: "What else could she have done? Lie? She saw there was no way to lie and get away with it."

links.title: Drama: "You would have caught it."
links.text: You would have caught it.

links.title: Volition: "Like hell you would have -- remembe..."
links.text: Like hell you would have -- remember?

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "I would have caught it.""
links.text: (Nod.) "I would have caught it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If not you, then me. It was a smar..."
links.text: "If not you, then me. It was a smart move from her."

links.title: You: ""She seems candid.""
links.text: "She seems candid."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You think so?" A shadow runs acros..."
links.text: "You think so?" A shadow runs across his face. "Being candid is the best way to lie. The appearance of candour, with some facts thrown in, draws attention away from whatever one chooses to omit."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She may be trying to control the p..."
links.text: "She may be trying to control the pace of the investigation. Anyway, we should move. I suspect our inquiries will bring us back here soon enough."

links.title: You: ""Something is off here.""
links.text: "Something is off here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You think so?" A shadow runs acros..."
links.text: "You think so?" A shadow runs across his face. "She seemed forthcoming... Unusually so. Being forthcoming about some things is a good way to obscure other things."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The best liars are always forthcom..."
links.text: "The best liars are always forthcoming... Anyway, we should move. I suspect our investigation will bring us back here soon enough."

links.title: You: "(Whisper) "I know she's manipulativ..."
links.text: (Whisper) "I know she's manipulative."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So you said to her.... What did yo..."
links.text: "So you said to her.... What did you *mean* by it?"

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "She has half my skillse..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "She has half my skillset compromised, singing her tune. My assessments of her are untrustworthy."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She seemed forthcoming to me... Un..."
links.text: "She seemed forthcoming to me... Unusually so. Being forthcoming with some things is a good way to obscure other things. But I wouldn't call myself compromised..."

links.title: You: ""Perhaps that's because you *are*?""
links.text: "Perhaps that's because you *are*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am not easily swayed by young wo..."
links.text: "I am not easily swayed by young women. But on the other hand... the best liars are candid. And she was candid."

links.title: Volition: "The lieutenant seems oddly sure he..."
links.text: The lieutenant seems oddly sure he is not compromised, not psychologically at least. Is it hubris?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anyway, we should move. I suspect..."
links.text: "Anyway, we should move. I suspect our investigation will bring us back soon enough."

links.title: You: ""Well. I am, anyway.""
links.text: "Well. I am, anyway."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What do you mean by that?""
links.text: "What do you mean by that?"

links.title: You: ""I'm not sure she *had* to lie. I w..."
links.text: "I'm not sure she *had* to lie. I wouldn't have known."

links.title: You: ""I have reason to doubt my ability..."
links.text: "I have reason to doubt my ability to see through her lies."

links.title: You: ""Got it. Let's go." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Got it. Let's go." [Leave.]
